name: Space Leprechaun
description: We invite you, go to the most introspective adventure with the cosmic leprechaun. Collect colors, dodging obstacles, defeat bosses. Immerse yourself in the pixel world of childhood.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: amd  AtlonX64 or intel Celerone Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5450G или Intel HD Graphics 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 38 MB available space Sound Card: integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: amd a10-5700 or intel core i3-2100 Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7660G or Intel HD Graphics 620 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 38 MB available space Sound Card: integrated
